entries.femaleVariant: Good evening, Night City. Tonight's main story – what's next for Arasaka? How will the Japanese megacorp emerge from this crisis?
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="皆さん、ご苦労感謝する" t="Good day, everyone. Welcome." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="なぜなら、アラサカはただの一企業ではないからだ" t="That is because Arasaka is more than just a corporation." b="" a=""/>
The company was recently shocked by a series of disastrous events – the most significant of which being an attack on their corporate headquarters last night.
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="どうも我々の敵は、アラサカを潰せると考えたらしい" t="It seems our enemies believed Arasaka could be destroyed." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="だが私は、彼らにこう伝えたい… 不可能であると。太陽を消し去り、海を干上がらせるほうがまだ簡単だろう" t="But I have message for them... It cannot be done. They've a better chance to extinguish the sun, or empty the seas." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="アラサカという強大な存在は誰にも止められない。アラサカは力そのものなのだ" t="Arasaka is a force – one that cannot be stopped or slowed. Arasaka is strength." b="" a=""/>
